pages.text: While out exploring today, I came across a strangely familiar sight: a wasteland. Looking at it, and the forgotten constructs within it, stirs up a sense of nostalgia. I am recalling memories of a bygone age, yet one I do not remember experiencing before.

pages.title: Forgotten Constructs
pages.text: The more I wander this place, the more I am burdened with an understanding of machinery I had no recollection of working with. Maybe I can use this newfound - or is it newly-remembered? - knowledge to my advantage...
